channel.title: Problem w/ customs
channel.description:
i just recently found the codes for customs and i was trying them out and i noticed that when i attacked w/ them they didn't work and it switched to punch. how do i get this to oroperly hit hit?
and all of the specials dont work either, how would i get them to work?
items that dont work: dragon claws bandos scimmy god scimmy supreme claws tri godswords (dual) saradomin sword <--works properly but spec dosn't work
i appreciate any help and would like to thank you for helping in advance
~~~ attk mast3r~~~

item.title: Problem w/ customs
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

i tried putting it in client.java but the compiler cme up w/ 100 errors

code i entered:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) { <–d claws
special amout >= 100
calculateSpecial();
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage = 0;
useSpecial = false;
}

or something like that. i followed the pervious ones before this exactaly but aparently it didn’t work. i think i might have forgot to add something.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem w/ customs
item.dc:creator: @pl0x15 pl0x15
item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

I agree with the two above. You can’t just put the code and bonuses of the item in weaponhandler.java and expect it to work. Also there ARE indeed tuts on this. You shouldn’t post a Help topic if theres a tut on it. That shows how much you know and tried.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem w/ customs
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Javafire:

it’s called you gotta code the whole thing, you don’t just add them and expect them to work… you have to code in the server and the client.

There are tutorials, and I agree with what he said.^

Read full topic

item.description:
